thread.title: Brian Smith featured on NBC as Guest on Americas PremierExperts
thread.title_full: Brian Smith featured on NBC as Guest on Americas PremierExperts | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Brian Smith featured on NBC as Guest on Americas PremierExperts
text:
(MENAFN Press) Real Estate Broker Brian Smith was recently seen on NBC CBS ABC and FOX network affiliates around the country as a guest on the TV show America’s PremierExperts® 
Orlando FL. – July 16 2015 – Brian Smith Real Estate Broker was recently featured as a guest on the TV show “America’s PremierExperts®.” The show filmed in Orlando FL was seen on NBC CBS ABC and FOX network affiliates around the country.  “America’s PremierExperts®” features an interview format with host Nick Nanton interviewing some of the best business marketing and financial minds from around the world.
Brian has been a Central Florida resident since 1985.  He is a member of the Orlando Regional Realtors Association National Association of Realtors Florida Association of Realtors and Central Florida Commercial Real Estate Society. Brian has extensive experience in the sales and leasing of residential and all types of commercial properties: professional office/medical industrial retail and investment properties.  He is a graduate of Webster University (B.S. Accounting) and a Licensed Real Estate Broker.  Brian proudly served on the local Board of Directors for BankFIRST Sanford from 2007 to 2014.  Brian enjoys participating in endurance events and spending time with his wife and two children.
To learn more about Brian and his services please visit 
“America’s PremierExperts®” was produced by Emmy Award winning director and producer Nick Nanton Esq. and Emmy Nominated Producer JW Dicks Esq. Co-Founders of America’s PremierExperts® and The Dicks and Nanton Celebrity Branding Agency®. 
###
